WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working as intended. They are actually different items, and we will provide a way to filter out either Horde or Alliance version of it once Wowhead/Armory is updated with that information. For now you can safely delete one of the items if you wish to not see both.
WorkItem.Description: I am seeing duplicate entries with the same jeming and everything in the list of items... Seems to add another one when you check for upgrades in Armory...

Comments.Message: Which items are you seeing? I'm in the process of going through the latest DB (since what was uploaded was an extension to what I submitted)

With this latest release I no long am seeing the duplicates, but they where when you clicked for find possible upgrades from armory. An at that time I had as many duplicates as I checked for upgrades. But seems to be fixed now... Thanks

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=47286
Belt of Biting Cold show up in Rarw twice, as it also shows up in the armory twice. Not sure if they are both in the game or if only one of them is. Armory shows them to be the same names but different item numbers, most confusing...
Hmmm I wonder if there is a way we can filter that. After all the Character Class has a faction flag.

Just checked two items 47300 & 47104 Horde & Alliance versions of the same dagger. There doesn't appear to be any info in the XML from Wowhead or Armoury that we could use to parse the data. This is quite annoying. Perhaps we could add a Faction flag to the item anyway and have a FactionItems.xml file that had entries such as <Item id=47300 faction="H" /><Item id=47104 faction="A" /> It would need to be manually created for now but would save a lot of FAQ questions like this.
Yes, I see there are a few items like that. It is possible for me to manualy remove those items from the data base, RIGHT?

Almost all of the items in Trials have a horde and alliance version. I'm expecting Wowhead to start having data of whether it's horde or alliance. At that point, we'll be able to filter between horde and alliance.
